mean_cn: n. 警长，郡治安官，州长
mean_en: (in the US) an elected officer responsible for keeping law and order in a county or town; (in England and Wales) an officer representing the king or queen in counties, and some cities, who performs some legal duties and attends ceremonies; (in Scotland) a judge; (in Canada) an official who works in a court preparing court cases
sentence: The sheriff wearing a police hat works to keep order in the county.
sentence_trans: 这位头戴警帽的郡治安官为维护当地郡县的治安而工作。
